content: > for help and community join our free > fb group 1 **naples table runner** **difficulty** intermediate **materials** ice yarns atlas #5 100% acrylic 100 gr 130 m color cafe latte 1 5 skein **i used acrylic yarn but this pattern calls for cotton yarn for more durability** hook us size 6mm yarn needle scissors measuring tape **gauge** 11 st x 5 row size 14 width x 35 length without tassels **stitch key** chain = chain half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet st treble_crochet - treble_crochet yo = yarn over **notes** the pattern is worked in row ch1 does not count as st at the beginning of each row chain 2 at the beginning of the row does count as 1st st you can work this pattern with one color or multiple as you wish- i used 1 solid color this pattern uses pattern repeats this pattern uses multiples of 4+2 stay calm and crochet sandra 1 https //www facebook com/groups/1485811495102299
